item.description:
Come join us for dinner and a movie.

Unless you've been living in a cave, you know the latest Harry Potter movie is out.

It's gotten really great reviews and I'm looking forward to seeing it, but I don't
want to go this weekend due to the crazy crowds.

So I was thinking we can go next Friday to Maggiano's for dinner and then catch the movie afterwards.
Please try to RSVP by Thursday afternoon so that I can make reservations for our group at the restaurant.

I would recommend picking up the tickets before dinner if possible.

Dinner Location:
Maggiano's Little Italy

Categories: Caterers, Italian [Edit]
Neighborhood: Back Bay
4 Columbus Ave
(between Eliot St & Church St)
Boston, MA 02116
(617) 542-3456

www.maggianos.com

and then we'll walk back to the Lowes to see the 9:00pm showing.

Hope to see you there! If you don't see us, just check in with the hostess.
item.how_to_find_us: Tall Asian dude with not so tall fiance next to me or just check with the hostess at the front desk.
item.name: Dinner & Movie - Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince at Lowes Boston Common
